title: Perma Banned and have some questions on it
body:
I got Perma banned and this is my first ever ban no 1 week no 1 month just straight perma banned and i want to know how i could get it appealed 
i got banned for being toxic i just want to know because im reforming now and i been nice or past 2 months after the ban and i just wondering if i could come back from it and join the community nicer, if i could get the account back il make sure to turn off all chat and be nicer to team overall and work on my toxicity, i feel like everyone has a right to try to reform and if this account get appealed and i get report again it will bee 100 percent on me for the next ban just doesn't feel right that my very first punishment was a straight perma banned plus riot said they will send me a email when they didnt and i even verified my email i could use some help.

Each game isn't an isolated contest where only the worst person wins a punishment. If you reported them their behavior will count against them the same way yours counts against you. Their chat is irrelevant to your case. Nothing they said makes it acceptable to call people %%%gots.

If you want to request for it to be removed them make a support ticket, however keep in mind that Riot will not overturn any punishments that were not made in error. That would be the only way to get it reversed or lowered, you have pretty low visibility to actual Riot members here.

how can i make a support ticket and also why have i never received my email about the detail to my toxic behavior

If you didn't get an email first check your spam as they get filtered there quite often I hear. If it is not there then it may have been the result of a manual review, which doesn't generate an email. If you would like chat logs in this case then your only option is a support ticket.

You can make a support ticket at this link: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201898070 Scroll down to the bottom (and read the article on your way it may help you) and click submit a request.
You used the F(a) word. That causes you to skip tiers, RIOT has very low tolerance for hate speech.

you used the word %%%%ots (i think you know which one i mean) which is concidered homophobic which like racial slurs can cause a instant perma ban. dont bother annyoing the support bans of this kind are never lifted

If Riot gave you back your account it would create the perception that toxicity can be pardoned and it's a standard Riot will not set. You were toxic and you reaped the results of toxic behavior.

Your only choice now is to play on your new account and avoid being toxic.
